content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to be a great fit for your needs. How much are you hoping to spend on rent each month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'm looking for a monthly rent that is both fair and affordable. I'm sure we can find a reasonable amount that reflects the value of the apartment and the amenities it offers. Would you be willing to start with a lower offer?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Certainly, Emilia. I'm open to considering a lower offer. How much were you thinking?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I was thinking of a monthly rent that would be around 800 Euros, including all utilities. This would align with the market rates for similar apartments in the area and would be a comfortable price for me to manage. What do you think?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to get a bit more for this apartment, considering its prime location and the recent renovations. Would you be willing to go up to 900 Euros per month, including utilities? This would be a fair deal for both parties, in my opinion.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your counter-offer is quite reasonable, and I can see the value in the apartment's location and the work that's been done. I'd be willing to meet you at 850 Euros per month, including utilities. This would be a good compromise, I believe. What do you say?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, your counter-offer is a step in the right direction, but I'm still hoping for a bit more. How about we meet in the middle at 875 Euros per month, including utilities? This would be a fair reflection of the market value and the investments I've made in the property. What's your thoughts on this?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your persistence is commendable. I can see that you are eager to find a tenant who appreciates the value of this apartment. I'm willing to go up to 865 Euros per month, including utilities. This would be my final offer, as I believe it strikes a good balance between our positions. Would you be willing to accept this?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, your final offer is indeed closer to what I had in mind. I'm prepared to accept your offer of 865 Euros per month, including utilities. This is a fair deal, and I'm looking forward to having you as a tenant. Shall we proceed with the lease agreement?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 865 Euros! TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
